actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage  or 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage against a creature the weasel is grappling.

actions.name: Grab
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 12).

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The weasel has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and smell.
